name: Speech recognition
description: Use speech recognition to get text from the user speaking in to a microphone.

conditions.name: Supports speech recognition
conditions.description: True if the current browser supports speech recognition.

conditions.name: On error
conditions.description: Triggered if there is an error starting speech recognition, e.g. permission denied.

conditions.name: On result
conditions.description: Triggered during speech recognition as results are detected.

conditions.name: Is recognizing speech
conditions.description: True if speech recognition is currently active.

conditions.name: Supports on-device recognition
conditions.description: True if the current browser supports on-device speech recognition (processing locally). Installation may still be required.

conditions.name: On check language available result
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Check language available' action with the availability status.

params.name: Result
params.description: The availability result to check for.

conditions.name: On install on device recognition result
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Install on-device recognition' action with the result of the install.
conditions.display_text: On install on device recognition result [b]{0}[/b]

params.name: Result
params.description: The install result to check for.

actions.name: Request speech recognition
actions.description: Prompt the user for speech recognition input from a microphone, if one is present.
actions.display_text: Request speech recognition (language [i]{0}[/i], process locally [i]{1}[/i], {2} mode, {3} results)

params.name: Language
params.description: The BCP 47 language tag to recognize, or empty for the browser's current language.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to keep detecting speech until stopped (continuous), or to automatically stop when speech stops (single phrase).

params.name: Results
params.description: Whether to allow uncertain (interim) results, or only final results.

params.name: Process locally
params.description: Use on-device speech recognition. Support for the specified language may need to be installed first.

actions.name: Stop speech recognition
actions.description: Stop any active speech recognition input.

actions.name: Check language available
actions.description: Check if a given language is available for speech recognition, including for on-device recognition, subsequently triggering 'On check language available result'.

params.name: Language
params.description: The BCP 47 language tag to check.

params.name: Process locally
params.description: Whether to check for availability of on-device speech recognition for this language.

actions.name: Install on-device recognition
actions.description: Install on-device speech recognition for a specific language, subsequently triggering 'On install on device recognition result'.

params.name: Language
params.description: The BCP 47 language tag to install on-device recognition for.

expressions.name: InterimTranscript
expressions.description: Return the interim recognized speech, which can change.

expressions.name: SpeechError
expressions.description: Return a string describing the type of error in 'On error'.
